name: test
text:
Edit the provided image by updating the personalized text elements only.

Replace any existing name or text with a randomly chosen name.
Replace any existing number with a randomly chosen number where applicable.

Preserve the original typography, letterforms, sizing, spacing, outlines, and any dimensional or embossed appearance.
Do not change the product shape, icons, graphics, colors, materials, lighting, shadows, camera angle, or background.

Only the personalized text content should change. All other aspects must remain identical.

name: Themed Environment - Mars
text:
CUSTOM CONTEXT — THEMED ENVIRONMENT (REAL PLANET MARS)

The environment must depict the REAL planet Mars, not a fictional or stylized world.

This is NOT a game world, cartoon world, fantasy setting, or illustrative scene.

Depict the surface of Mars as seen in real NASA rover photography:
– Red and rust-colored soil
– Rocky terrain
– Dust, pebbles, and uneven ground
– A barren, desolate outdoor landscape
– Natural sunlight with realistic shadows

Do not stylize the environment.
Do not use bright pastel colors.
Do not depict candy, castles, smiling objects, characters, or illustrations.
Do not create a whimsical, playful, or cartoon-like scene.

The background must clearly read as the real planet Mars at first glance.
